citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:15pm on 31
December 2020. I called the facility manager, spoke with a driver, and waited 30 minutes.
End Section
